text:
Not to recommend to go here. Better go to other swimming complexes, as stuff in Geylang East is unfriendly and behaves as if they were in a dictatorship. "You are nog allowed to do this, don't do that.... " regarding things nobody would and should normally care for at all.
They make you feel not welcome here.

Special thanks to all the ActiveSG swimming complex staff of Geylang East Swimming complex, for keeping the pool open and keeping the swimmers safe even on a Public holiday!

🫡

If it’s called a “public” swimming pool it shall open for the public rather than for athletes training only during public “leisure time” like weekday evening and weekend. The public cannot go swimming for weekday evenings in the standard pool, although the residents have no other option nearby to go swimming. I cannot get it!

Small active sg gym and pool. But good enough for regular fitness freaks
💪💪💪💪💪🏊🏊🏊🏊🏊
During phase 3 this swimming complex is never too busy. Relatively clear lanes. Place is kept clean and well maintained. The shower facility is newer than others I’ve been to on the island.
